name: Lovely Links
description:
This is a classic puzzle game where the goal is to eliminate all blocks within the given time and unlock beautiful CG images. In the game, there are three power-ups available: Bomb, Hint, and Refresh. Let's learn about the gameplay together!

Gameplay Rules:


Within the game area, there are blocks arranged in a grid, each with different patterns or symbols.
You need to find blocks with the same pattern or symbol within the grid and eliminate them to clear the entire game area.
You can connect two identical patterns or symbols by drawing a straight line, with turns only allowed in horizontal and vertical directions and without crossing other blocks.
Once two matching patterns or symbols are connected, they will disappear, and the corresponding blocks will be removed, leaving an empty space.
By eliminating all blocks within the given time, you can unlock a beautiful CG image and receive a random power-up as a bonus.

Power-up Introduction:


Bomb Power-up: Use the bomb power-up to eliminate all blocks of the same kind at once, helping you quickly clear challenging-to-connect blocks.
Hint Power-up: Use the hint power-up to receive a clue on connecting blocks, guiding you to find matching patterns.
Refresh Power-up: Use the refresh power-up to rearrange the positions of the blocks, providing you with new elimination possibilities.

Utilize the power-ups strategically during the game, eliminate all blocks within the given time, unlock beautiful CG images, and receive additional power-up rewards. Come and challenge your Connect Link skills! Enjoy the game!
